titleStmt.title: The divine authority of the Holy Scriptures asserted in two discourses the former shewing the nature and extent of the inspiration vouchsaf't by the Holy Ghost to the penmen of the Scriptures ... : the latter shewing the divine authority of the vowels and accents in the Hebrew text ... in a discourse concerning the division of the Bible into chapters and verses : to which is added, A discourse concerning the testimony of the Spirit on Rom. 8. 16. / by Sam. Clark ...
titleStmt.author: Clark, Samuel, 1626-1701.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: copy at reel 21:12 contains only the first discourse; copy at reel 1882:21 contains only the second discourse, "Exercitations concerning the original of the chapters and verses in the Bible. London, 1698". Neither copy contains the third part, "Discourse concerning the testimony of the Spirit."
Item at reel 1882:21 is identified as Wing C4491 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of originals in Harvard University Libraries and British LIbrary.
